Breaking down the new Palisades Tahoe ski resort name and logo

After a year of discussions and meetings, the ski resort formerly known as Squaw Valley has been renamed Palisades Tahoe. But the new name doesn’t just refer to the world-famous ski area. It’s meant to encapsulate the formation of a single mega-resort in North Lake Tahoe.

A fire gutted a home for the elderly. Why is it still vacant despite willing buyers?

A fire-gutted elderly care facility has sat vacant for six years despite efforts to turn it back into housing for the vulnerable. It’s emblematic of the challenges faced by local officials and advocates trying to fix the city’s entrenched problems.
